name: GrownUpRadio
0:
”Alexa, Open Grown Up Radio”
”Alexa, Start Grown Up Radio”
”Alexa, Play Grown Up Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grown up radio
des:
Tune in to Gary Kelley's Grown Up Radio for all the best in music for adults. Enjoy an amazing mix of oldies, classic rock and a touch of country, all in one place! Amazing stereo quality heard all over America. 
Get your daily dose of nostalgia with Grown Up Radio! 

Perfect for Alexa and streams via the free app from your phone to Apple Car Play or any streaming device.

Have a special dedication to your surprise, the special person in your life? 
Let us know anytime, 24/7 and when you would like it aired. 888-235-2532

Just chillin'

Gary Kelley

Broadcasting from San Diego in Beautiful Southern California
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
